com.hazelcast.instance

Interface HazelcastProperty

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientProperty, GroupProperty

    @PrivateApi
public interface HazelcastProperty
    Interface for Hazelcast Member and Client properties.

    • Property Summary

      Properties 
      Type Property and Description
      String clearSystem
      Clears the environmental value of the property.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String clearSystemProperty()
      Clears the environmental value of the property.
      String getDefaultValue()
      Returns the default value of the property.
      int getIndex()
      Gets the index of the property.
      String getName()
      Returns the property name.
      GroupProperty getParent()
      Returns the parent GroupProperty of the property.
      String getSystemProperty()
      Gets the environmental value of the property.
      TimeUnit getTimeUnit()
      Returns the TimeUnit of the property.
      void setSystemProperty(String value)
      Sets the environmental value of the property.

    • Property Detail

      • clearSystem

        Clears the environmental value of the property.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Gets the index of the property.
        Returns:
        index of the property

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the property name.
        Returns:
        the property name

      • getDefaultValue

        String getDefaultValue()
        Returns the default value of the property.
        Returns:
        the default value or null if none is defined

      • getTimeUnit

        TimeUnit getTimeUnit()
        Returns the TimeUnit of the property.
        Returns:
        the TimeUnit
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no TimeUnit is defined

      • getParent

        GroupProperty getParent()
        Returns the parent GroupProperty of the property.
        Returns:
        the parent GroupProperty or null if none is defined

      • setSystemProperty

        Sets the environmental value of the property.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to set

        String getSystemProperty()
        Gets the environmental value of the property.
        Returns:

        Clears the environmental value of the property.
